author: Sephiko

text: I rented this game and finished it, but I can't say it was anything more than mediocre. The soundtrack is by far the game's best aspect. I remember hearing this tune in the first town when you start the game and thinking I was in for a great adventure, then as soon as I stepped inside the first cave and fought some monsters I quickly realized that probably wouldn't happen. Still, Atland is one of my favorite town themes on the SNES.
author: SupraDarky
